# dependencytrack_team (Resource)

Manages a Team.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Team.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID for the Team as generated by DependencyTrack.
